welcome.message: sign up to find a new wave of living

signup.heading: Welcome to roomeight
signup.title: Sign Up
signup.enterDetails: Please enter your details below. The password must be at least 8 characters long.

chooseStatus.heading: What are you looking for?
chooseStatus.select: Please select what applies to you
chooseStatus.roommate: My flat is looking for a new roommate
chooseStatus.flat: I want to access an existing flat profile

addPictures.heading: Add pictures
addPictures.infoFlat: To give a good impression of your flat, add pictures of the apartment, the free room and social events :)
addPictures.infoSingle: To give a good impression of yourself, add some more pictures that represent your personality :)

completePersonalProfile.heading: Complete your personal profile
completePersonalProfile.info: Choose your profile picture and tell us about yourself.
completePersonalProfile.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a longer description of your job, hobbies or roomeight expectations

completeSingleProfile.heading: Tell us about yourself
completeSingleProfile.info: Which tags describe you best? When will you be able to move in?

completeFlatProfile.heading: Tell us something about your flat

roomInfo.heading: Spit some facts about the free room!
roomInfo.info: You need to specify the address, other fields are optional. But the more you tell your future roomie, the better :)

flatInfo.heading: Who are you and your roomies?
flatInfo.info: Tell your potential new roomeights something about your flat, so they can get an idea of what it's like to live with you!
flatInfo.descriptionPlaceholder: Add a longer description of your jobs, hobbies or roomeight expectations
flatInfo.biographyPlaceholder: That's your flat in one sentence

addAddress.heading: Where are you located?
addAddress.info: Enter the address of your flat here. Only matches can see your address. To other profiles, the area where you live will be displayed on a map.

addRoomie.heading: Add a room8 to your flat
addRoomie.info: Type in the email of your room8 to allow them access to the app.

accessExisting.heading: Would you like to join a flat that already exists?
accessExisting.failure: Please contact the roomie who has set up the flat profile to add you with your email.
accessExisting.success: You have been successfully added to the flat. Please continue and complete your personal profile.

createFlat.heading: Give your flat a name!
createFlat.info: What do you guys call yourselves? Maybe the name of your street? Also, add a profile picture for the flat so that people get a good impression :)
createFlat.name: Name

done.heading: This is it!
done.title: Are you ready to see some profiles?

discover.heading: Discover
discover.empty:
You have browsed through all the profiles!

Maybe you'll find more if you adjust your filters?

filter.matchingTimeRangeExplanation: If you activate the clever time range search, you will only be shown profiles that might be relevant according to your move-in and move-out date.

matches.heading: Matches
matches.incompleteInfo: For the match to become complete, your room8s need to like the profile too...
matches.incompleteMatchesInfo: At least half the room8s of your flat need to like a profile for it to become a match. Check out which profiles need your approval!
matches.noIncompleteMatches: No new likes of your room8s

chat.heading: Chats
chat.noChats:
You haven't started
any chats yet...
chat.startedChat: started a chat with all of you

errors.userAlreadyExists: A user with this email already exists. Try logging in or choosing a different email address.
errors.problemWithApplication: There is a problem with the application. Please try again later.
errors.serverError: There is a problem with the server. Please try again later.
errors.userWithEmailNotFound: No user with this email can be found. Have you registered yet?

leaveFlat.sure: Are you sure you want to leave your flat?
